about.description: Cafe Rio is a cozy coffee shop offering a variety of beverages and light meals. We pride ourselves on using high-quality ingredients and providing a welcoming atmosphere for our customers.
about.mission: To create a community space where people can enjoy great coffee and food while connecting with others.

drinks.name: Cold Brew Coffee
drinks.description: Smooth and refreshing cold brew coffee

drinks.name: Cappuccino
drinks.description: Espresso with steamed milk and foam

food.name: Avocado Toast
food.description: Sourdough bread topped with smashed avocado and spices

food.name: Caesar Salad
food.description: Romaine lettuce, parmesan, croutons, Caesar dressing

food.name: Monster Cookie
food.description: A large cookie with chocolate chips, oats, and M&Ms
